meaningMnemonic: Coming down with the <radical>rain</radical> is <radical>two</radical> <radical>spikes</radical>. They go right through two <kanji>ghost</kanji>s.
readingMnemonic: You come across the <kanji>ghost</kanji>s, who are stabbed into the ground. "Please," they beg. "Please use that <reading>ray</reading> (れい) gun that's in that <reading>row</reading> (りょう) boat and end our suffering."
